get
***


Description
===========

Gets the specified backend set's configuration information.


Usage
=====

   oci lb backend-set get [OPTIONS]


Options
=======


--load-balancer-id [text]
-------------------------

The OCID of the specified load balancer. [required]


--backend-set-name [text]
-------------------------

The name of the backend set to retrieve.

Example: *example_backend_set* [required]


--from-json [text]
------------------

Provide input to this command as a JSON document from a file.

Options can still be provided on the command line. If an option exists
in both the JSON document and the command line then the command line
specified value will be used


-?, -h, --help
--------------

For detailed help on any of these individual commands, enter <command>
--help.
